testsuite.name: 2 - I can change a user password

testcase.name: 2 - I can change a user password NB-2-1 Should change password

failure.message:
cy.request() failed on:
http://127.0.0.1:8080/login
The response we received from your web server was:
> 401: Unauthorized
This was considered a failure because the status code was not '2xx' or '3xx'.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: 'failOnStatusCode: false'
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: POST URL: http://127.0.0.1:8080/login Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "Content-Type": "application/json", "Authorization": "Basic bmIwMkBleGFtcGxlLmNvbTpsYWI3cm9ja3Mh", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_6) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) HeadlessChrome/81.0.4044.122 Safari/537.36", "accept": "application/json", "cookie": "lab7user=2|1:0|10:1588093326|8:lab7user|228:cHJRdEF4N0VpOERHei1mMGdvdXM3T0V5LXBkS1ptNV82TmFJU21KUVN1bkpPLVJMemphNW1ZbThOVzBFYUlIOWhoaEhUeWRyS1VpU2hDR0lrQnBJdjF6aGdOM2FVM0k2alNiNThHclZSTmk5eHFKbUU2eDlwb0ZSa253QzdUWkxRNGUxWExGN3I0bEx0MXdhVW5QaWVfLW43Q0x4RjNDb0NlZkVwT1NwbVpJ|a158e91de30525f9811a4b7f2e6d8ec6f4ac0fb9b5cf5df371629760d7c3bce9; lab7sso=\"\"", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-length": 0 }
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 401 - Unauthorized Headers: { "x-powered-by": "Express", "cache-control": "no-cache, no-store", "access-control-allow-headers": "access-control-allow-origin,authorization,content-type", "date": "Tue, 28 Apr 2020 17:02:06 GMT", "content-length": "57", "access-control-allow-methods": "GET, PUT, POST, DELETE, OPTIONS", "connection": "close", "pragma": "no-cache", "server": "Lab7_ESP/2.3.1", "expires": "0", "access-control-allow-credentials": "true", "login-url": "/login", "session-token-expires-minutes": "120", "access-control-allow-origin": "*", "content-type": "application/json; charset=UTF-8", "vary": "Accept-Encoding", "server-execution-time-ms": "4.59599494934082", "x-server": "server_8004", "x-frame-options": "sameorigin", "x-content-type-options": "nosniff", "x-xss-protection": "1; mode=block", "set-cookie": [ "l7_esp_server_id=; Expires=Thu, 01-Jan-1970 00:00:01 GMT; path=/" ] } Body: { "error": "A user with those credentials was not found." }
